sig_info: All Buffs on Silver Surfer have 5 to 50.01% increased Potency.

PASSIVE: Silver Surfer takes -100% damage from Coldsnap, Incinerate, and Shock Debuffs. Each stack of these Debuffs count as a Unique Buff for any of Silver Surfer's abilities.
Each hit deals a Burst of 9.88 Energy Damage for each Unique Buff. This scales with base attack only.
THE POWER COSMIC BUFF: At the start of the Fight, Silver Surfer generates an indefinite Power Cosmic Buff. If this Buff ends for any reason it will return in 9 seconds.
While the Power Cosmic Buff is active Silver Surfer rotates between dormant icons every 2 seconds in the order of Combat Power Rate, Fury, then Armor Up.
Consuming the Power Cosmic Buff converts the dormant icon into an active Buff and inflicts 3 Armor Break Debuffs each reducing the Opponent's Armor Rating by 282.35 for 12 seconds. Max 3 Stacks.
ROTATING BUFFS - MAX 2 OF EACH:: Refresh the expiry of all active Buffs when creating a Rotating Buff that does not already exist.
Combat Power Rate: Increase Combat Power Rate by 15% for 15 seconds.
Fury: Increase Attack Rating by 39.5 for 24 seconds.
Armor Up: Increase Armor Rating by 1600 for 24 seconds.
WHEN CHARGING A HEAVY ATTACK: If available, consume the Power Cosmic Buff and create a Phase Buff, causing Opponent's 100% chance to Miss for 1.10 second(s).
SPECIAL ATTACKS: Pause the Duration of Silver Surfer's Power Cosmic Buff Cooldown, his Rotating Dormant icons, and all active Buffs until the Special Attack ends.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: If available, consume the Power Cosmic Buff and create 2 Buffs based on whichever dormant icon was active.
If at least 3 Unique Buffs are active when launching this Special Attack gain a Vigilance Buff allowing all attacks to bypass Miss for 12 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Silver Surfer increases the potency of any bursts of Energy or Physical damage by 180% for the duration of this Special Attack.
If at least 3 Unique Buffs are active when launching this Special Attack, Silver Surfer creates an Unblockable Buff for 4 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Gain an Aptitude Buff increasing the potency of Silver Surfers Fury, Armor Up and Precision Buffs by 25% for 24 seconds, then Retrigger each of Silver Surfers active Rotating Buffs. Max 1.
Each Aptitude Buff on Silver Surfer also increases the potency of his Combat Power Rate Buffs by 25%.

Fury: Increase Attack Rating by 430.5 for 24 seconds.
Armor Up: Increase Armor Rating by 1950 for 24 seconds.
WHEN CHARGING A HEAVY ATTACK: If available, consume the Power Cosmic Buff and create a Phase Buff, causing Opponent's 100% chance to Miss for 1.10 second(s).
SPECIAL ATTACKS: Pause the Duration of Silver Surfer's Power Cosmic Buff Cooldown, his Rotating Dormant icons, and all active Buffs until the Special Attack ends.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: If available, consume the Power Cosmic Buff and create 2 Buffs based on whichever dormant icon was active.
If at least 3 Unique Buffs are active when launching this Special Attack gain a Vigilance Buff allowing all attacks to bypass Miss for 12 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Silver Surfer increases the potency of any bursts of Energy or Physical damage by 180% for the duration of this Special Attack.
If at least 3 Unique Buffs are active when launching this Special Attack, Silver Surfer creates an Unblockable Buff for 4 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Gain an Aptitude Buff increasing the potency of Silver Surfers Fury, Armor Up and Precision Buffs by 25% for 24 seconds, then Retrigger each of Silver Surfers active Rotating Buffs. Max 1.
Each Aptitude Buff on Silver Surfer also increases the potency of his Combat Power Rate Buffs by 25%.

sig_info: All Buffs on Silver Surfer have 5 to 50% increased Potency.

PASSIVE: Silver Surfer takes -100% damage from Coldsnap, Incinerate, and Shock Debuffs. Each stack of these Debuffs count as a Unique Buff for any of Silver Surfer's abilities.
Each hit deals a Burst of 150.38 Energy Damage for each Unique Buff. This scales with base attack only.
THE POWER COSMIC BUFF: At the start of the Fight, Silver Surfer generates an indefinite Power Cosmic Buff. If this Buff ends for any reason it will return in 9 seconds.
While the Power Cosmic Buff is active Silver Surfer rotates between dormant icons every 2 seconds in the order of Combat Power Rate, Fury, then Armor Up.
Consuming the Power Cosmic Buff converts the dormant icon into an active Buff and inflicts 3 Armor Break Debuffs each reducing the Opponent's Armor Rating by 352.94 for 12 seconds. Max 3 Stacks.
